name: io.github.csjoblom/musclesworked
title: MusclesWorked
description: Exercise-to-muscle mapping MCP server. 856 exercises, 65 muscles, 14 muscle groups with primary/secondary/stabilizer activation data. Analyze workouts for gaps and find alternative exercises.

environmentVariables.description: Your MusclesWorked API key (get one at musclesworked.com/dashboard)
environmentVariables.name: MUSCLESWORKED_API_KEY
